scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && mkdir -p dist/cli/core && cp ../../node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.wasm dist/cli/core/ && cp ../../node_modules/sql.js/dist/sql-wasm.js dist/cli/core/ && mkdir -p dist/skill/references && cp skill/SKILL.md dist/skill/ && cp -r skill/references/ dist/skill/references/ && chmod +x dist/cli/cli/index.js
